original_title: Sri Lanka rupee opens at 323.80/324.10 to the US dollar
original_body_lines: ECONOMYNEXT – Sri Lanka’s rupee opened at 323.80/324.10 to the US dollar on Friday, from 323.90/324.00 the previous day, dealers said.
A bond maturing on 01.06.2026, was quoted at 13.80/90 percent.
A bond maturing on 15.01.2027 was quoted at 13.80/85 percent.
A bond maturing on 01.07.2028 was quoted stable at 14.10/25 percent.
The Colombo Stock Exchange opened up; the All Share Price Index was up 0.12 percent at 10,639; the S&P SL20 was up 0.25 percent at 3,061. (Colombo/Dec29/2023)
